sys_ui_message.key: This name applies to the container and also shows up in the ServiceNow App store. It's not the name of a Workspace or Mobile application. It can't be more than 100 characters long.
sys_ui_message.message: This name applies to the container and also shows up in the ServiceNow App store. It's not the name of a Workspace or Mobile application. It can't be more than 100 characters long.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: This name applies to the container and also shows up in the ServiceNow App store. It's not the name of a Workspace or Mobile application. It can't be more than 100 characters long.
